sen.j: 宮下太吉、菅野スガ、新村忠雄と共に天皇暗殺の構想を抱いていたとされる。
sen.e: FURUKAWA was believed to have had a design for an assassination of the emperor with Takiti MIYASHITA, Suga KANNO and Tadao SHINMURA.

sen.j: 実弟は月の輪書林古書目録の「古河三樹松散歩」で知られる、アナキストで書店主の古河三樹松（1900年 - 1995年）。
sen.e: His real brother was a bookshop-keeper and also an anarchist famous for 'FURUKAWA Mikimatsu sanpo' of Tsuki no shorin (bookshop) Mikimatsu FURUKAWA (1900-1995).

His biological brother was Mikimatsu FURUKAWA (1900 - 1995), an anarchist and a bookshop keeper, who is known for 'FURUKAWA Mikimatsu sanpo (stroll),' a catalogue of antiquarian books by Tsuki no wa shorin (book shop).
